shoot-ornaments.blurb: A gun shoots ornaments and sticks them on a christmas tree.

ornaments-are-platforms.blurb: The ornaments can be jumped on by players

obstacle-gun.blurb: A variant of the ornament gun shoots spikes, walls, etc.

walls.blurb: Walls prevent players from moving up the tree and can be broken with ornaments

save-checkpoints.blurb: Players touch a checkpoint to respawn there if they die

first-level.blurb: Players must climb a christmas tree using only the ornaments from their gun and their wits

team-deathmatch.blurb: One team climbs the tree, the other team places obstacles in their path

floor-is-lava.blurb: Players must scramble up the tree before melting in quickly rising lava

golf.blurb: Climb the tree using as few ornaments as possible

collectible-items.blurb: Players earn points for picking up rare items

points-for-blocking.blurb: Players earn points for preventing opponents from climbing

game-music.blurb: Festive music plays during the game

custom-music.blurb: Write and perform original music for the game

basic-icon.blurb: Make the game visible/advertisable to ROBLOX users

define-art-style.blurb: Carefully select in-game props and meshes to adhere to a festive theme

vote-next-round.blurb: Players decide which game mode to play for the next round
